ValidationRule.description: When "What requires review" equals "Poor Ticket Quality/Incorrect or Missing Information", then the "Field(s)" field is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( INCLUDES( What_Requires_Review__c , "Poor Ticket Quality/Incorrect or Missing Information") && ISBLANK ( Field_s__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please choose your Field(s) to be reviewed.
